definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: There are 8 standards to relax the requirement for rare periodical edition.
sentences.chinese: 提出近現代期刊善本的8條評價標準。

sentences.english: We have eight thousand books, many of them are rare and valuable.
sentences.chinese: 我們的圖書館有八千冊圖書，很多都是善本和珍本。

sentences.english: There are many errors when The Booklist of Chinese Ancient Rare Books registered the copy.
sentences.chinese: 《中國古籍善本書目》著錄丁本時有誤。

sentences.english: The article points out the value of three books of calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 該文分析了三種善本碑帖的價值。

definition: manuscript (of a book etc)/sketch (of a design etc)
Tripitaka Koreana, Buddhist scriptures carved on 81,340 wooden tablets and housed in Haeinsa 海印寺[Hai3 yin4 si4] in South Gyeongsang province of South Korea
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
a rubbing from a stone inscription
